hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Recovery Momentum After Stress Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from STRESS to NEUTRAL regime, a 3-day consecutive increase in BTC futures open interest (>5% daily) while spot volume declines (<10% daily) predicts a 7-day BTC price appreciation >8% with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Stress regimes flush out weak hands; early OI recovery with declining spot volume suggests institutional positioning before retail re-entry. This creates asymmetric upside as liquidity returns.
entry_conditions: Regime shift: STRESS → NEUTRAL (confirmed by regime model)
BTC futures OI increases >5% for 3 consecutive days
BTC spot volume declines <10% daily during same period
BTC price within 15% of recent 30-day low

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7 days elapsed OR BTC price appreciation >8%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price drops >4% below entry OR regime reverts to STRESS

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If 3-day OI increase >5% with declining spot volume fails to produce >8% price appreciation in 7 days in >40% of STRESS→NEUTRAL transitions.
